long_description: This 775ml pot converts instantly from food carrier to a cooking pot. Hinged handle doubles as a locking device to secure the lid and as a convenient cooking handle. Fitted lid with a top handle. Scratch and dent resistant stainless steel stands up in the most rugged conditions. Rounded corners help heat travel up sides of pot more quickly, boosting efficiency.
short_description: This 775ml pot converts instantly from food carrier to a cooking pot.
